article.description: Caleb Hollander had a career-high 22 points as Belmont beat Morehead State 77-60 on Thursday night.
article.headline: Hollander nets 22, Belmont beats Morehead St 77-60
article.linkText: Hollander nets 22, Belmont beats Morehead St 77-60
article.story: NASHVILLE, Tenn. -- Caleb Hollander had a career-high 22 points as Belmont beat Morehead State 77-60 on Thursday night. Nick Muszynski added 20 points, nine rebounds and six assists for the Bruins (11-3, 2-1 Ohio Valley Conference), who led 40-26 at the half. Dylan Windler had 12 points for Belmont (11-3, 2-1 Ohio Valley Conference). Lamontray Harris had 13 points for the Eagles (4-12, 0-3), who have lost four games in a row. Jordan Walker, the Eagles' leading scorer entering the matchup at 15 points per game, shot only 15 percent in the game (2 of 13) and scored nine points. Morehead State shot 33 percent while Belmont shot 51 percent. --- For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP-Top25 --- Elements of this story were generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
